name: Creature
remarks: Creates and returns a new Creature instance based on the specified Creature asset.

input.name: name
input.desc: the asset name of the desired Creature

output.desc: a new instance of the requested asset

name: Item
remarks: Creates and returns a new Item instance based on the specified Item asset.

input.name: name
input.desc: the asset name of the desired Item

output.desc: a new instance of the requested asset
